snippet.title: Beat of the Pixel Heat - First Teaser
snippet.description:
Beat of The Pixel Heat is a rhythm game in which you must control HEAT, an artificial intelligence responsible for defending cyberspace from a wave of viral elements that have invaded your home!

The game is currently in development, and with each update in the project, new stages and game modes may arrive. (plus some story to make sense, duh!)

The songs used can be found through newgrounds.com, with the rights reserved to their respective composers. More information and links in the readme attached to the game download.

You can play the first beta of the game on my itchio page. Go and check it out! :)

Link: https://lucasmegastriker.itch.io/beat-of-the-pixelheat

==============

Music from the showcased levels:

Power Glove by F-777:
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/895234
Tasty by MadHouseDude (Kawmander):
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/808762

Title screen song:

Bamboozled by MadHouseDude (Kawmander):
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/808437
